diff_hunk:
@@ -60,8 +60,13 @@ class Transform(object):
             the codomain. Transforms that are not bijective should at least
             maintain the weaker pseudoinverse properties
             ``t(t.inv(t(x)) == t(x)`` and ``t.inv(t(t.inv(y))) == t.inv(y)``.
+        event_dim (int): Number of dimensions in the transform ``event_shape``.
body: But how is that connected with transforms? Do `event_shapes` have to match, or can you add more dependent axes because the transforms operates e.g. on vectors?
body_html: But how is that connected with transforms? Do event_shapes have to match, or can you add more dependent axes because the transforms operates e.g. on vectors?
body_text: But how is that connected with transforms? Do event_shapes have to match, or can you add more dependent axes because the transforms operates e.g. on vectors?
